titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at St. Lawrence Church in Reading, in the county of Berks on the 3d of October, 1692 being the day on which the mayor was sworn / by John Griffyth ... ; printed at the request of the mayor and aldermen.
titleStmt.author: Griffyth, John.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
